author: donaldp
msg: A a class to hold enums for the level at which to log.

author: donaldp
msg: Add a converter that converts between strings and org.apache.avalon.framework.Enums. It is expected that the Enum class have two public static methods with the following signatures
(may return null or throw an IllegalArgumentException if bad name)
This is a replacement for EnumeratedAttribute that is more friendly to people who want to use enums programatically.

author: donaldp
msg: Made sure that the MasterConverter verified that the slave converters return the correct type. If not then it will raise an exception.

author: donaldp
msg: Made the MasterConverter search through the destination classes hierarchy to find a match for converter. This will allow a converter that converts to a specific superclass also work for all subclasses.
